item.description: I would love it if you could share an organization I am passionate about- Friends of the Orphans. They are hosting FREE Faces of Hope event which is an one-hour breakfast with a heartfelt testimonial from a former Pequeño whose life has been transformed through the work of Friends of the Orphans and Nuestros Pequeños Hermanos (NPH, Spanish for “Our Little Brothers and Sisters”). There is an ASK but no minimum gift is expected. As much as anything, it is an opportunity to come and learn more about our organization! There is also a $100 Door Prize Gift Certificate to the Palm Restaurant in Boston! Breakfast Wednesday, November 2 7:30 a.m. -8:30 a.m. Doors Open at 7:00 a.m. The Neighborhood Club 27 Glendale Road | Quincy, MA RSVP by October 31 Breakfast Friday, November 4 7:30 a.m. -8:30 a.m. Doors open at 7:00 a.m. Boston Marriott Peabody 8A Centennial Drive | Peabody, MA RSVP by October 31 RSVP Online at: www.friendsoftheorphans.org/2011faces
item.name: FREE Breakfast while learning about Friends of the Orphans
